Candidates who have passed the Undergraduate degree with a minimum aggregate of 50% and above, from any recognised University in India or abroad recognised by UGC / AIU, are eligible to apply.
(i) Undergraduate in Computer science or Computer applications who is working in any Software Industry / IT / ITES.
OR
(ii) Degree in Science / Engineering with 3 years work experience with software Industry / IT department.
why_choose: Why choose this course? Embrace continuous learning amid tech advances. Identify interdisciplinary research opportunities. Foster research culture with scientific integrity. Grasp professional, ethical, and social responsibilities. Promote tech for environmental sustainability. Show disciplinary competency and leadership.
what_learn: What you will learn? Cultivate continuous learning amid tech evolution, staying reflective in a dynamic context. Recognize and explore opportunities in interdisciplinary research for a holistic perspective. Elevate research culture, maintaining scientific integrity, and promoting objectivity. Grasp professional, ethical, and social responsibilities integral to a computing professional's role. Comprehend the significance of technology, fostering its judicious use for environmental sustainability. Showcase disciplinary expertise, employability, and leadership skills through practical demonstrations.
modules: Modules Build a robust database foundation, covering relational, XML, and NoSQL databases for design, storage, and retrieval skills. Comprehensive Data Analytics knowledge using Python, fostering skills in program development for effective data analysis. Year 1 Explore advanced web technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, MEAN, and FULL Stack for interactive and modern web applications. Examine advanced operating system topics, understanding parallel processing, distributed systems, UNIX, MACH, real-time, and mobile operating systems. Grasp high-performance computing concepts, covering load sharing, balancing, and exploring architectures and performance in Grid and Cloud computing. Year 2 Gain extensive knowledge of storage and storage networking, covering attachment architectures, SCSI, RAID, IP-based SANs, and storage networking issues.
career: Career prospects Facilitates continuous learning for career advancement in technology. Empowers with interdisciplinary research skills for varied career paths. Cultivates a research-oriented mindset, ensuring professional integrity. Builds a foundation in ethics, fostering responsibility in diverse roles. Emphasises tech for sustainability, aligning skills with industry demands. Develops discipline expertise, employability, and leadership acumen.
